application

Class Wizard

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Person
      • application.Wizard

  • public class Wizard
extends Person
    A Wizard class that describes a magic user character as would be used as a Video Game Character
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Richard Salvaty

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wizard

        public Wizard()
        No argument constructor that creates a generic Wizard object

      • Wizard

        public Wizard(java.lang.String fN,
              java.lang.String lN,
              java.lang.String sex,
              java.lang.Byte age,
              java.lang.String bio)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        A constructor that creates a Wizard object with the most common properties set at construction time
        Parameters:
        fN - The first name of the new Wizard object
        lN - The last name of the new Wizard object
        sex - The gender of the new Wizard object (valid values are "male", "female", and "unspecified")
        age - The age in years of the new Wizard object (age must be a positive integer less than 128)
        bio - The biography of the new Wizard object (must not exceed bioLength)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the passed in Bio exceeds the set biolength
